All wheel drive can be useful
Not for the purpose of off-roading (4WD better for that not AWD  2 different things)
But for the purpose of power delivery  rain driving  etc.
Also Blindspot monitoring is something a lot of people here need sadly
Auto High beam on Lexus and Toyota is a pain
Have seen many drivers using the lights on auto which is fair
But they don't realize that the car has decided to use high beams on inner roads or coming out of dimly lit exits and blinding oncoming traffic
